name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomodoro Timer: To Boost Your Productivity

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the pomodoro technique to boost your productivity. This is a simple timer that helps keep you on track as you work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have an easy to use Pomodoro Timer in your chrome extension. Keep track of how long you have been working and get alerted when it is time to take a break or go back into action. The Pomodoro technique is an effective way to boost your productivity and this chrome extension is the perfect helper for it.
